version_description: Fix a crash condition introduced in the last version.

• Improved DNS latency — the app now always uses the closest server from our network.
• Improved censorship resistance — if NextDNS did not work before on some networks or in some countries, you should try again.
• Hardened Privacy Mode — only use DNS servers located in jurisdictions with strong privacy laws, outside of the 14 Eyes.
• Passcode lock — for parental control when NextDNS is installed on your kids' devices.
• Status information in the Settings — displays DNS latency and the server location you are currently using.
• Support for Dark Mode on iOS 13.

Please try as many of those as possible and report back any bugs or improvements. Enjoy!

• Fix device name not being sent after iOS reboot (when the option is turned on in Settings).
• Other small fixes.

• Increased resistance to networks and countries specifically trying to block NextDNS.
• Improved privacy when sending Device name (Devices are now unique to a configuration and can't be uniquely identifiable between 2 configurations). This will result in a duplicate device in the Analytics section (this will only happen once).
• Other small fixes.

• Greatly improve latency in some regions.
• Small bugfixes and improvements.

If you're having issues with the app, please reach out to us via the chat available on https://nextdns.io or by email at support@nextdns.io.

Stay safe everyone.

On iOS 14, this version uses the new native Encrypted DNS setting and does not require running a "fake" VPN in the background anymore.

IMPORTANT: You must open the app and re-enable NextDNS once after this update or after upgrading to iOS 14 to migrate.

Deprecation (iOS 14 only):
• The Hardened Privacy feature has been deprecated.
• We have removed the Status section in the Settings as it was confusing less tech-savvy users and may lack accuracy on iOS 14. Both location and latency can still be checked manually using popular tools like dnsleaktest.com or by pinging dns.nextdns.io.

---
Please report any issues you encounter to us via the chat available on https://nextdns.io, on our subreddit /r/nextdns or at support@nextdns.io.
This update includes latency improvements. We recommend that you open the app once the update is complete.
